power.title: Blood Sacrifice
power.fluff: You wound yourself, offering your pain to the spirits in exchange for a more telling strike

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You can choose to take 1d10 or 2d6 damage. You cannot reduce or negate this damage.
If you choose to take this damage, you gain a bonus to the damage roll for this power equal to the damage you took + your Constitution modifier. If the damage bloodied you, the bonus increases by +5.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: If you took the damage, you deal damage equal to one-half the minimum roll.

power.title: Crushing Rush
power.fluff: The impact of your attack smashes your foe back to crush it against solid terrain

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 2 squares.
If the target ends this push adjacent to blocking terrain, the target takes damage equal to your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Damage equal to your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus, and you push the target 1 square.

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can use this attack in place of a melee basic attack on a charge.

power.title: Curtain of Steel
power.fluff: You are the pacing lion, the circling predator, and no attack will come toward you without being answered in kind

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy adjacent to you makes an attack against you

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering enemy adjacent to you

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Rageblood Vigor:
section.text: If the triggering attack hits you, you gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-half your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Thaneborn Triumph:
section.text: If the triggering attack misses you, you gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-half your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

power.title: Deny Escape
power.fluff: In your bloodlust, letting an enemy go isn't an option, so you attack with a force that prevents it from escaping your fury

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Whirling Frenzy:
section.text: You can choose to deal 2[W] (main) + 2[W] (off-hand) + your Strength modifier damage instead.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Devastating Leverage
power.fluff: You swing your weapon in a wide arc, using the terrible power generated by its length to smash your enemy to the ground

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding a two-handed reach weapon.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If the target is not adjacent to you, you knock it prone.

power.title: Fearsome Smash
power.fluff: Smashing your weapon through your foe's defenses injures both body and will

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to all attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Thaneborn Triumph:
section.text: The penalty equals 2 + one-half your Charisma modifier (minimum -3 penalty).

section.name: Special:
section.text: You can also use this power as an immediate interrupt with the following trigger and hit:

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy adjacent to you hits you

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to all attack rolls until the start of its next turn.

section.name: Thaneborn Triumph:
section.text: The penalty equals 2 + one-half your Charisma modifier (minimum -3 penalty).

power.title: Feast of Violence
power.fluff: You drop your guard as you come close for your attack, drawing primal strength from the violence directed at you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You can choose to provoke opportunity attacks.
If you do, you gain a +1 bonus to the attack roll for each creature that attacks you, and deal +1[W] additional damage with this attack.
If a creature scores a critical hit against you or a solo creature hits you, the additional damage increases to +2[W] instead.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: If you chose to provoke opportunity attacks, you deal damage equal to your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus + 1 for each opportunity attack that hit you.

power.title: Great Shout
power.fluff: You slam your weapon into a foe, then give voice to the fury of your ancestors, cowing those who dare to stand against you

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and each enemy within 5 squares of you is terrified of your shout.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Each enemy within 3 squares of you is terrified of your shout.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each creature that is terrified if your shout takes a -2 penalty to all attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Rageblood Vigor:
section.text: If you are bloodied, the target's penalty equals your Constitution modifier instead.

section.name: Thunderborn Wrath:
section.text: The penalty equals 2 + one-half your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Harbinger of Doom
power.fluff: You hack through one foe, and your battle cry heralds doom for the enemies before you

section.name: Primary Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
You make the Howl Attack as a close blast 3. The primary target must be in the blast.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You make the Howl Attack as a close blast 2. The primary target must be in the blast.

section.name: Howl Target:
section.text: Each enemy in the blast

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each howl target gains vulnerable 5 to all damage until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Thunderborn Wrath:
section.text: The vulnerable equals 5 + one-half your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Looming Threat
power.fluff: An ally might have raised a foe's ire, but once you strike, that enemy must pay attention to you

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage.
If the target is marked by an ally, this attack deals +1[W] additional damage, and you must mark the target until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Rageblood Vigor:
section.text: While the target remains marked by you, you gain a power bonus to damage rolls against it equal to your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Thaneborn Triumph:
section.text: While the target remains marked by you, the ally that was marking the target gains a power bonus to damage rolls against the target equal to your Charisma modifier.

power.title: Shattering Strike
power.fluff: The primal force flowing from your body enables your attack to strike true even against enemies that are not fully there

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier force damage. This damage ignores the insubstantial quality.

power.title: Slash and Slash Again
power.fluff: You strike hard and then lay into enemies all around you

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding two melee weapon.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC (main weapon)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] (main) + Strength modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the start of your next turn, you can use the following action at-will:

section.name: Free Interrupt:
section.text: Trigger: An enemy starts its turn adjacent to you; You deal 1[W] (off-hand) damage to the triggering enemy.

section.name: Whirling Frenzy:
section.text: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.

power.title: Tide of Blood
power.fluff: Your anger sweeps over every enemy nearby, drawing on the flowing blood to fuel the tide of your assault on one of them

section.name: Thunderborn Wrath:
section.text: You can choose for this power to deal thunder damage and to gain the Thunder keyword. If you do, you push the target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier on a hit, or half the distance on a miss.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage.
The attack deals additional damage equal to the number of enemies adjacent to you.

section.name: Rageblood Vigor:
section.text: The additional damage equals the number of enemies within a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier instead.

section.name: Thaneborn Triumph:
section.text: You also deal additional damage equal to twice the number of bloodied allies within a number of squares equal to your Charisma modifier.

section.name: Whirling Frenzy:
section.text: Instead of dealing additional damage, if you are wielding two melee weapons, you can choose to deal damage to each enemy adjacent to you other than the target. The damage equals your Dexterity modifier + your off-hand weapon's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Wheat to the Scythe
power.fluff: The enemies fall before your weapon's wide arc, like wheat to the scythe

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each enemy in the burst that you can see

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Strength vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage and the target falls prone.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage, and you must push the target to the closest space outside of the burst.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You regain a number of hit points equal to the number of enemies you hit, or twice the number of enemies you hit if you are bloodied.
